


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->

# ```js isSafari ```


Detect if is safari

## Parameters

- **ua** (navigator.userAgent) String: The user agent on which to make the test



## Example (js)

```js
import isSafari from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/safari'
if (isSafari()) {
  // do something cool
}
```
